meanings.definition: The quality or state of being multicity.
meanings.sent1: The multicity of the event brought together people from various places.
meanings.sent2: The multicity of colors in the painting made it vibrant and lively.
meanings.sent3: The multicity of flavors in the dish created a delightful culinary experience.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had a multicity that made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The multicity of talents in the team ensured success in diverse projects.

meanings.definition: The presence of multiple cities within a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The multicity of the region attracts tourists from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent2: The multicity of cultures in the neighborhood makes it a melting pot of diversity.
meanings.sent3: The multicity of landmarks in the city makes it a sightseeing paradise.
meanings.sent4: The multicity of opportunities in the urban area offers a range of career choices.
meanings.sent5: The multicity of architecture in the downtown area showcases various styles and influences.
